hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Bottle#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Haunted Wasteland# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #2# major items.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Purple Rupee# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a hero ventures #beyond the wasteland# to learn #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #1# major item.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #the Requiem of Spirit#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern MQ Iron Boots Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #a Bow#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #9# major items.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Arrows (5 pieces)# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: That's a nice wall you got there. Would be a shame if I just... clipped right through that.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: Did you know that you only need to play the Song of Time to open the Door of Time? The Spiritual Stones are not needed.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #a Water Temple Small Key# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that racing #Damp's ghost# rewards...^ #a Huge Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Trail## has #7# major items.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Game Key#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path of time.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs #Know-It-All Brothers' House#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #ReDead in the royal tomb# guard #the Prelude of Light#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Farore's Wind# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #House of Twins#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Minuet of Forest#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Minuet of Forest#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Game Key#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ Megaton Hammer Chest
